lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: It is an opportunity to help people move from poverty and develop self confidence.

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering small business owners and like to cut out large bureaucracies--I love Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I teach young people how to manage their money.

lender.name: Alice and Phil
lender.loan_because: We can

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: it's something I can do to help families make better lives for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help owners of small businesses with their bookkeeping, so they can make their businesses more profitable.

lender.name: Millicent
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it possible, with infinitely small effort and risk, to do more than simpy wait for large organizations or political bodies to fix a problem. Because it feels good, and is good, and makes tremendous sense. Because it rewards initiative and helps a few people know they are not entirely abandoned by the rest of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I design internal websites and portals for large corporations that are intended to enable their people to be more effective in their work.

lender.name: Lisa and Tony
lender.loan_because: kiva takes an already great idea (microlending) and adds immediacy and simplicity to make it brilliant.
lender.occupational_info: Lisa is a planning analyst with Hennepin County, who specializes in sustainable and equitable development. Tony is a commercial photographer who specializes in editorial and portraiture of musicians and artists.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work in financial administration for a university.

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: I am called by God to do so.

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: I have been looking for a meaningful way to help others- now that I've found kiva I can see that I am able to fulfill my goal while also forging bonds across the globe with a single click of the mouse. This is such a unique concept, and a completely rewarding way to connect with people around the world.

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: I like the fact that I can control precisely where my money goes and that 100% of my donation goes there. $25 here and there means nothing to me in the long run, but to these folks, it's a large step toward financial security.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the communications office of California Assembly Speaker Fabian Nunez and edit a Democratic blog, the California Majority Report.

lender.name: daniel
lender.loan_because: To share my good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a community health center in a rural area in northern California. I maintain the computers and other equipment, and write grants to help provide equipment and services.

lender.name: NGP
lender.loan_because: I want to connect with humanity and show my support for those who are underserved
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying computer science and looking to develop computer systems to address the needs of all of humanity, not just those with the most wealth

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in need to help themselves.

lender.name: Brian and Joyce
lender.loan_because: We have been so fortunate in our lives, and this is an opportunity to share with others, a chance to live their lives to their potential, and live out their dreams.

lender.name: Miranda and Dola
lender.loan_because: We have both lived in East Africa. Dola is from Tanzania and Miranda lived there for three years. We have witnessed the tremendous poverty throughout Africa as well as the strength and generosity of the people who live there. We wanted to contribute something to help those in need of an extra boost. We have all been in places where we've needed help from others, but the poor in Africa need it more than most. We believe that microfinance can truly make a difference in the lives of people and thank Kiva for its excellent work to help us connect from so far away. We also are mourning the passing of Miranda's 96-year old grandmother and gave our most recent loan in her memory.

lender.name: Alisa
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Terry & Michelle
lender.loan_because: God's law is: Give and it shall be given; not just what you are "owed" but with the measure you use-if we give as we are blessed others are blessed and what goes around... comes around - Good Luck to everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I (Michelle) work in accounting and on all 30 computers in our office including the network servers. I like my job because no two days are the same. Terry is retired from the USMC and he volunteers w/the county Sheriff Department two days a week helping in the courtroom and with the senior watch program.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can with the time that I have to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical student but also work in the food service industry.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: it's fascinating that I can help someone financially but then not really spend any money in the end.
lender.occupational_info: I study how to make computers easier for humans to use.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need and think that it is important to share with others who may have fewer opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: Prior to my retirement I worked in law enforcement.This job allows me to work with kids and their families to insure that they get an education. I used to teach high school.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: it makes a positive difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student majoring in Speech-Language Pathology.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: The need is obvious. A good man, Bob Garnier died on 3-27-07 and the family said contribute to the cause of your choice. He was a creative man and he would have like the KIVA concept.
lender.occupational_info: I retired as a Human Resources Manager. I am now a part-owner of a Market where we sell Antiques, Art and Collectibles.

lender.name: carthy
lender.loan_because: I think that it's better to put money in the hands of a person or a community to enable and empower them to change their lives rather than hoping a government or bank will do so. Like all parents, I hope my children have brighter and better opportunities, so I also loan to help other parents help their children to a brighter future too.
lender.occupational_info: I work on creating and supporting applications that run on computers that allow employees of my company to manage our products. I work at a company that also supports microlending and communities of microentrepreneurs

lender.name: Kristy
lender.loan_because: I love helping people and hopefully I am doing my small part to make this world a better place to live. Good luck Teresia!

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: I like to support people who are working so hard, often in difficult circumstances and because Kiva makes it easy. It is also amazing (and rather guilt-inducing) to see how a small amount of money (for me) can go so far to making a difference in another part of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help financial companies find good people to work for them.

lender.name: Laure and Nathan
lender.loan_because: we are lucky to be where we are. We want to share what we have.

lender.name: Milton
lender.loan_because: the funds go directly to recipient
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I am looking for a way to make a difference one small step at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I work in rural Alaskan villages bringing economic development to low income areas. The cost of success is high in Alaska so it feels good to be able to help individuals through small loans.

lender.name: Erin & Derek
lender.loan_because: It's nice to be able to help other people help themselves. Maybe one day when they are successful they will lend to others in need.

lender.name: Javier
lender.loan_because: I have it and someone else needs it.

lender.name: Rachelle
lender.loan_because: every person has a story, and no circumstance or environment should keep it from being heard.

lender.name: Dimitra
lender.loan_because: A SMALL amount can make a BIG difference!

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I have seen first hand how important microfinance is to development - not just the individuals but to the country. I want to help build a vibrant middle class in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I work in international health - living mostly in foreign countries, working with host governments to improve health in their country - maternal and child health, AIDS, malaria

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupation: teacher of English as foreign language
lender.occupational_info: I teach business English to adult students in Belgrade, Serbia. I also teach English as a foreign language to children ages 6-9.

lender.name: Helmi
lender.loan_because: I want to make poverty history.

lender.name: PETER
lender.loan_because: I'm able to.

lender.name: vijayr
lender.loan_because: just feel like it

lender.name: Philippe
lender.loan_because: I believe we're all connected in one or the other way... So if I can make a difference to people on the other side of the world, they can also make a difference to others. You get what you give.
lender.occupational_info: I am Chief Social Media Officer at the Van Marcke Group of Companies, responsible for the use of social media for internal and external communications & collaboration.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I think the world would be a healthier place if everyone cared about the people in need and gave a helping hand. We have to take care of each other...or......the saddness will continue in the struggling areas of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I photograph people. I am fasinated by humans and the environments they live in.

lender.name: Liesbeth
lender.loan_because: I believe in this way of contributing.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people communication skills.

lender.name: Pierre
lender.loan_because: Because i can , because it pleases me, because Kiva makes it possible.

lender.name: Hopkins family
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I write about new ideas that wil make the world a better place.

lender.name: Iain Lowe
lender.loan_because: My father has been involved in the development of the third-world since I was a child. I grew up in Port-au-Prince, Hati and Conakry, Guinea where he worked with groups such as CECI, CIDA, the World Bank and the United Nations. I like the ability to make affordable (for me) loans to specific individuals and to lend a helping hand where I can.
lender.occupational_info: In an effort to increase companies' efficiency, I work with teams of people to build computer programs that replace repetitive and useless manual labour.

lender.name: Jeff & Beth
lender.loan_because: It's a small way to share the wealth we've been lucky to receive.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others learn.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: We are all stuck on this planet together so we might as well work with each other to make it a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I own a internet website that sells health and nutritional products.

lender.name: Terese
lender.loan_because: It makes sense to share the wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife and mother and artist. I paint and work with clay. I am blessed with 2 healthy children and happily married.

lender.name: Rosemary
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together - a helping hand to one helps all - to God be the Glory!
lender.occupational_info: believer in and activist for humanity and environmental causes.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting entrepreneurship and independence. Making loans through Kiva makes me feel good! Thank you for the opportunity to participate!
lender.occupational_info: I train people to train their dogs so they are good pets and good canine citizens.

lender.name: SEEDS
lender.loan_because: we believe in economic justice!

lender.name: vanessa
lender.loan_because: There's something to be said of the immense pleasure you get knowing that you are helping peeps who are fiercely working to make even bigger dreams happen.
lender.occupational_info: Graphic, web designer, future small biz owner.

lender.name: Mohammad Farid
lender.loan_because: I want to help people learn how to fish rather than giving them a fish

lender.name: Greg And Daryl
lender.loan_because: We felt it was the right thing to do and are currently trying to guilt our friends into helping out.
lender.occupational_info: Computer system consulting

lender.name: balletxaraguahaiti
lender.occupation: non profit dance school in Haiti

lender.name: steven
lender.loan_because: I wish to reach out every day to fight poverty.
lender.occupational_info: family, community, friends. Just like everyone else.

lender.name: Constance
lender.loan_because: The abundance of wealth in the United States needs to be shared throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer at the Kalamazoo Ministry drop in center. I'm active participant in community issues. I do not support the war in Iraq.

lender.name: Westtown Friends School
lender.loan_because: We are studying interest and finances. We're applying our learning to real world issues by raising money and managing our kiva portfolio.
lender.occupational_info: Showing that math can be used for social change!

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to realize their dreams.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I am happy to be able to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a tutor for young students whose parents must work hard in order to make ends meet, and they often have little time to spend helping their children.

lender.name: Jim Wilshire
lender.loan_because: I like to think that I can help make a difference in someone's life. I think it's a responsibility that certain of us should all share because it's an investment in the future.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist. I love boats and the water and enjoy painting them.

lender.name: West Third
lender.loan_because: I've got it way too good not to share what I can sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I build and maintain web sites for my own company and for others.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I admire the hard working people who try to better their lives and the lives of their families and just want to try and help in some small way.

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people I have needed help from people before. So I would like to help others

lender.name: Katiana
lender.loan_because: I understand how rewarding it is to have control over your own finances and the excitement when your business is doing well.
lender.occupational_info: I silkscreen on t-shirts and other materials.

lender.name: Amanda Catherine
lender.loan_because: I'm so greatful that this website exists. This is a great way to offer help to someone who needs a basis to create a successful business.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Connecticut and a waitress at a local restaurant.

lender.name: Dorrit E. Nelson
lender.loan_because: I feel compelled to help and I cannot think of a better way to assist others around the world.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: Although entrepreneurship is not the right path out of poverty for everyone, it is clearly the best path for many. This is a way for me to help a few people take that first step out of poverty but at a lower "cost" than with outright donations because most of the money will eventually come back to me. Then I can turn it around and lend it to someone else, and help multiple people with the exact same $25 over and over. I think that's just very cool!
lender.occupational_info: I am program manager for the Global Disability Rights Library (GDRL) project. The GDRL project is working to bring knowledge on disability rights to people in developing countries who have little or no internet access.

lender.name: Karl
lender.occupational_info: I grow businesses in a variety of industries. Currently working with a publisher of games for cell phones.

lender.name: ken
lender.loan_because: that is the best way to empower people to take care of themselves

lender.name: Jil
lender.loan_because: I believe in teaching a man (or woman) to fish. And I also think this is the smartest, most creative, most sensible idea in years.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a publishing company, writing advertising, brochures, mini-magazines, marketing materials, and lots of other marketing and promotional items.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of having a real impact on a real life, of being a part of making someone else's life a little bit better. It's personal. It's effective. And it empowers people to empower themselves.
lender.occupational_info: My job is very creative. I get to come up with ideas for new toys and new ways to play with them.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I am also an entrepreneur and am very grateful for my resources and want to share them with other business owners.
lender.occupational_info: I sell restored vintage metal furniture.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: It's a less patronizing way to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I help different people find the books and/or information they need and give them a smile as well.

lender.name: christoph
lender.loan_because: because i care. & because i can.

lender.name: Bob and Abbey
lender.loan_because: It's such a great idea AND the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired but volunteer to teach BASE parachuting (fixed object skydiving)and live in Inverness, California, forty miles Northwest of San Francisco. Abbey lives near London.l

lender.name: Kim & Terence
lender.loan_because: It is a direct way to be involved with people.
lender.occupational_info: We garden with respect for the soil food web, the many invisible critters who live in and make our soils, connecting us all.

lender.name: Barrie
lender.loan_because: it's a brilliant way to generate a large impact with a small amount of money.

lender.name: Van
lender.loan_because: I want to help the people of Latin America. While studying Spanish, I have lived with several families in Costa Rica, Guatemala, Mexico, and Peru. I would like to see the economy of their country's improve.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired, but have worked in adult education most of my life. I have taught English to students (mostly soldiers) from over 35 countries.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I've got extra babysugar!

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone has a duty to help a fellow human being. I feel that I'm just doing my part to help and i really enjoy it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Quality Assurance/test engineer, working for a major telecom Co. in Tampa, FL. My work includes testing Applications, processes and IT equipments

lender.name: Persian
lender.loan_because: I enjoyed Muhammad Yunus' Nobel Peace Prize speech and wanted to support him and his ideas.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: it's exciting to see that you can reach out and help someone. Whenever I see someone struggling on the margins, I think "there but for the grace of God." I've had success in life, but wonder if I would have been able to succeed without all the benefits of growing up middle-class in America.
lender.occupational_info: I develop books.

lender.name: Team Grotto
lender.loan_because: We are all distribution centers for our prosperity. We are grateful for the opportunity to believe in people/businesses. Thank you.
lender.occupational_info: Our team does marketing/business development.

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: I like to make the world sing in perfect harmony.
lender.occupational_info: I over see a group of people with disablitys, and help them produce the best printer cartridge that is then sold.

lender.name: August
lender.loan_because: I have some money saved but I do not like to give to charities. This is a much better way to be productive with saved money.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired university professor.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: it is good way to do something nice for people, and you know where the money is going.
lender.occupational_info: I manage an antique and jewelry store. I also buy and sale Art, coins, watches, and cars.

lender.name: Patrick & Fay
lender.loan_because: We believe in "People Helping People".
lender.occupational_info: I work for a credit union in Texas and make loans to individuals for the same reasons that Kiva makes loans available to people all around the world. Fay works as a public servant and helps those indiviuals who are in need.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I want to do something, and this is the "thing I can do" as an individual, that has the most impact.
lender.occupational_info: I was a partner in a large custom cabinet shop in Michigan making quality furniture for the office and residential markets.

lender.name: Clark and Marji
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am an account administrator and work with health care institutions needing long-term loans to upgrade their services.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: everyone needs help at one time or another to get a business going and for me it's so gratifying to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses run better.

lender.name: caterina rindi
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can, because one day I may need a similar loan, and because I support women in business.
lender.occupational_info: I work in education, teaching at elementary schools, working at the university level, and with various non-profit organizations.

lender.name: Meagan & Andrew
lender.loan_because: We believe that the best assistance you can give someone is to make them self sufficient. In the hope that one day they can pay it forward to others.

lender.name: Rollins
lender.loan_because: We think this is a great way for our family to be engaged in the world we live in.

lender.name: Jakob
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing. I thought I should loan money. It seems like you're a nice guy.
lender.occupational_info: I go to kindergarten and I'm 5 years old.

lender.name: Ariel
lender.loan_because: I want to show my 6-year old brother how important it is to look outward at the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help schools build better, greener, healthier buildings for schoolchildren across America.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: A simple way to touch and improve lives.

lender.name: Jeanie & EB
lender.loan_because: We like seeing the recipients of our loans succeed. Each success is like ripples in the water because it touches many other lives.
lender.occupational_info: Retired but trying to make more ripples.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I can and am grateful for the opportunity
lender.occupational_info: I play with my grandchildren, I have 8 and I love them all.

lender.name: Becca and Bill
lender.loan_because: Carpe Diem

lender.name: Ellie
lender.loan_because: I find joy in helping people out.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and research current international business issues.

lender.name: jerome and diane
lender.loan_because: I can and it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Small law practice (Jerome) and Educator (Diane).

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Why not? People need a hand sometimes,things kind of work out that way.
lender.occupational_info: Parcel delivery person.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because:
I'm blessed to have enough resources that I CAN help.
Note: I do not make loans to people who contact me directly. Please do not misuse Kiva in this way.
lender.occupational_info:
I work at a university, where I teach introductory biology to students who are not majoring in the sciences. It's a real challenge, because so many of my students are terrified of science. What I try to do is teach them a few essential concepts, approach the topics in many different ways, and show them how science applies to their own lives.
On the side, I write books for children. Most of what I write is nonfiction books for schools and libraries on topics in science, technology, and crafts.

lender.name: BEATRICE
lender.loan_because: I am qualified and equipped to ascertain the level of poverty, appraise a project and a person.
lender.occupational_info: I had developed poverty alleviation tools through which our trained staff will target the poor amongst our community.We designed various structured loan products.Developed systems and procedures and succesfully run a micro-finance programme in INDIA

lender.name: Julian
lender.loan_because: it is the morally just thing to do.

lender.name: Jeanene
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women help themselves and succeed economically.
lender.occupational_info: At work, I manage a team of managers, software developers and analysts that build and support a business website.

lender.name: Raelle
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world better.
lender.occupational_info:
I made my first loan to a woman who sells toys and wants to pass her business on to her children.
My second loan was to a former school teacher who has children including one adoptee.
My third was to a woman who helps support her children by selling goods from her home.
My fourth was to a man who pays for his children's education by making and repairing jewelry.
My fifth loan was to a woman who sells newspapers and magazines, office supplies, and toys.
My sixth loan was to a group with a member who sells toys.
My seventh loan was to a man who sells toys and party supplies.
My eighth loan was to a woman with a toy store in a Mongolian bazaar.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: A great way to help people help themselves - thanks to Kiva for making it possible. A nice place to park your savings and put it to work - a much more satisfying "rate of return" than a savings account, especially nowadays!

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: every person's contribution matters, and I respect and choose to help people that want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I manage people who manage various projects for a large information technology company.

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.loan_because: it's so little to do for so much good.
lender.occupational_info: I develop software for a small (for now) company.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I can't resist the urge to make this kind of difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I sing, mostly like the instruments of a rock band or jazz band. I also build websites.

lender.name: Yavonna
lender.loan_because: I'm a long-time fan of microfinance. Kiva makes it easy to play a role.
lender.occupational_info: Law school

lender.name: Niko
lender.loan_because: A great way to help somebody long-term.

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: I believe in this method. What an easy and effective way to give a hand. All the best to the founders and supporters of Kiva.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I currently manage a shopping mall for an international company based out of Australia. I love what I do and look forward to every day!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I think that by providing money in that form to small entrepreneurs who can't otherwise get finance is the money is more likely to be effectively used than if it is given as charity
lender.occupational_info: Teacher of the Alexander technique

lender.name: Morten
lender.loan_because: I wan't to give hardworking people a chance to get something done.

lender.name: Frans de Graaf
lender.loan_because: By sharing my welfare, I hope to give prosperity
lender.occupational_info: Optimalisation of water and sewage systems.

lender.name: christian
lender.loan_because: I have the chance to be born in a wonderful country (France), to be free, and to run my own business. It's just time to share some of my luck with entrepreneurs
lender.occupational_info: I've created a web agency, offering dedicated services to small companies

lender.name: Ludo
lender.loan_because: I live in a rich country, and think this is a perfect way too make a small contribution.
lender.occupational_info: Voff!

lender.name: Jess & Brian
lender.loan_because: There are people who need the money more than we do.

lender.name: Makaya
lender.whereabouts: Lagny sur Marne Seine et Marne
lender.loan_because: Je suis la recherche de partenariats pour le dveloppement d'une activit commerciale.
lender.occupational_info: Je suis actuellement en phase de cration d'entreprise et souhaiterai voir avec vous, dans quelle mesure pourrions-nous converger nos synergies.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: It's great to help people start their own business by lending small amounts that even I can afford!

lender.name: Per C.
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Vigleik M
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Andreas T. Waardal
lender.loan_because: I want people to do somting god for the coming years.
lender.occupational_info: Iam a Supervisor / Service Engineer for Crane and lifting equitmens on and offshore.

lender.name: Ryan M
lender.loan_because: I want to help others!
lender.occupational_info: I create websites that businesses use to create more business and get more customers. I also create websites that help businesses operate more effectively such as digital paperwork & organization systems and marketing and promotions platforms.

lender.name: Ben and Bea
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed in our lives, and want to pass some of that on to other people. We believe strongly in helping others, not just through charity, but by enabling them to become self-reliant.

lender.name: TxBikeRider
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to recycle money and help break the chain of poverty in other countries. There's nothing more empowering than being able to look at something you've accomplished on your own (with a little help from a friend).
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: As a sociology student, I find classism and poverty to be the most detrimental of all social ills, and I hope, through this small effort, I can be part of someone's solution.

lender.name: DeShawn
lender.loan_because: when you have it, it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: DIGBIJOY
lender.loan_because: I want to study furthur , Iam an engineering student of 1st year but due to lack of money my education is now stopped
lender.occupational_info: Iam an engineering student who wants to read furthur , but my education stop due to lack of money

lender.name: Altman-Bodnick Family
lender.loan_because: at this year's Passover seder, our family discussed different ways we could help those in need. After seeing a story on Kiva.org on Frontline World, we were inspired to participate.

lender.name: Parker & Kevin
lender.loan_because: I worked for an NGO involved in small business development and micro-lending and saw first hand the impact of empowering people to own and expand their businesses.

lender.name: GRAHAM
lender.loan_because: i want to contribute someting to society
lender.occupational_info: I work hard, I work long

lender.name: Elio
lender.loan_because: Creo en este tipo de proyecto y pienso que es una de la forma que podemos ayudar a los demas.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I like to think that a hand up helps everyone as it's done me in the past so I wish to pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: Software developer many years. Retired now and work mainly around my yard.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity for individuals with money to lend, even small amounts of money, to participate in the microlending revolution.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small architecture firm in the state of Michigan. I am a graduate of Earlham College in Richmond, Indiana (www.earlham.edu).

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: Blessed to be born in US and have access to school loans. Now it is my pleasure and turn to share the light!
lender.occupational_info: Part social work - part fun!

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because:
relationships are the framework of our community and of our small world.
"When I was young, my ambition was to be one of the people who made a difference in this world. My hope is to leave the world a little better for my having been there." --Jim Henson
lender.occupational_info: I was a Peace Corps Volunteer in Africa in the early 1980s.

lender.name: Pal
lender.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Albert Family
lender.loan_because: microloans can change the life of one person. It may seem like an insignificant loan, but for them, it might change their life.

lender.name: Edward
lender.occupational_info: I am in my second year of medical school at The Ohio State University, learning to become a doctor.

lender.name: Debwong
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that a little can go a long way. My husband & I are also self-employed, and understand the value of a "leg up" in starting their business. Making a positive differnce is the best thing that we can do in this life.
lender.occupational_info: I sell items on eBay, often worldwide, and also help as a photographer's assistant, digital imaging specialist and web designer for our business, Spring Mountain Gallery.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: My wife and I are able to lend a hand. Not a hand out, a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy homes.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: My wife and I want to share our blessings. What a positive opportunity, thank you.
lender.occupational_info: I control (operate) the movement of cargo trains. We transport autos, coal, chemicals, appliances, etc..

lender.name: sandra
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for what I have and my life, hence I would like to help others to have a chance of a beautiful life on earth.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: "For in truth it is life that gives unto life- while you, who deem yourself a giver are but a witness." - Kahlil Gibran

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: All sorts of people have helped me in the past and enjoy helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Own shoe stores and real estate business.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro-lending and its possibilities. I believe Kiva has successfully developed a sustainable way of reducing poverty and I would like to contribute to their efforts to end world poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of international studies and political science at The College of New Jersey. I plan to study sustainable development in graduate school. Currently I am studying abroad in Valparaiso, Chile. I hope to work in the future with poverty reduction programs such as Kiva.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I believe that my financial capital should always be working.
lender.occupational_info: I am helping to understand the genetics of pregnancy. My team is looking for genetic markers that predict pregnancy problems. So.....I sign women up for our research and manage our samples.

lender.name: PAUL
lender.loan_because: This is great!
lender.occupational_info: I make websites. I flush out ideas. I sell ideas.

lender.name: Fox & Deb
lender.loan_because: we have our health, a good marriage and a few dollars in the bank & with all that believe it's time to help others at home and abroad.
lender.occupational_info: Yesterday's history. Tomorrow's a mystery. Today's a gift, that's why we call it the present.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people to have a better life.

lender.name: Victor
lender.loan_because: TO IMPROVED THE QUALITY OF APICOLA'S PRODUCT AND HELP OTHER TO HAVE A BETTER LIVING.
lender.occupational_info: AS A PRESIDENT OF APICOLA'S FOUNDATION OF THE DOMINICAN REPUBLIC, INC. I HELP TO GET FUNDS AND LOGISTIC HELP TO INCREASE THE WORK OF THE UNITY OF PRODUCTION FOR THE AFILIATED.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I believe in investing in the lives of others as others have invested in me.

lender.name: Joe & Frances
lender.loan_because: As a family we are fortunate to have most of our needs met. We feel that these micro loans are a particularly efficient means to help others become self-sufficient and to know that in some small way our family will help another family meet their needs.
lender.occupational_info: Joe has worked in various aspects of entertainment for thirty years as Union Craftsman and Independent Contractor. Frances is part owner of a full service hair salon in California. She has been an enthusiastic stylist for thirty years.

lender.name: Preece
lender.loan_because: I need to get involve, we are not alone ;-)
lender.occupational_info: I am a art director working for magazines.Too much in front of my computer, but aware of the world I am living in. I love arts, travels, and making friends all over.

lender.name: Harry
lender.loan_because: I have a little more than I need, some people have a little less, I hope it balances out.

lender.name: Olivia
lender.loan_because: A friend got me started and it's a fun and easy way to help entrepreneurs around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with special needs students.

lender.name: Curran Family
lender.loan_because: We hope to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: Being an entrepreneur myself, I know the trials and tribulations of running a business. Being able to reach out to someone else that lacks the necessary funds and resources to grow their own business, is highly rewarding and truly necessary of those in the position to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I run a business that provides toner and ink cartridges to other suppliers and businesses around the United States & Canada.

lender.name: dave
lender.loan_because: Every bit makes the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I purchase electronics components for a manufacturing company.

lender.name: Byrd
lender.loan_because: I loan in memory of my Dad, Byrd Miller. Byrd was a happy free-spirited guy who inspired people to do their best.

lender.name: Michel van den Hove
lender.loan_because: "The only place where poverty should be is in museums." M Yunus

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Maybe 50 years ago, Clarence Jordan, founder of Koinonia, wrote, "What the poor need is not charity, but capital," and it's exciting to be able to fill that need. Just reading about the businesses and the other lenders makes me more hopeful about our world.
lender.occupational_info: I edit reports about schools for a non-profit educational consortium. In my spare time, I try to fix the world by prompting one conscience or one imagination at a time.

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.loan_because:
Soy un persona extremadamente afortunada. He tenido y aprovechado oportunidades que muy poca gente en este mundo llega a tener. He viajado por el mundo, he visto y vivido mucho mas de lo que 99% de la gente del mundo se da cuenta que existe. Siento que es mi obligacion moral compartir e inspirar como muchas veces otra gente exitosa lo ha hecho por mi. Asi que aqui tienen a un mexicano dispuesto a cambiar el mundo aunque sea un poquito. Como dice el dicho, para el mundo uno no es mas que una persona, pero para una persona uno puede ser el mundo. Que llegen al exito, y cuando lleguen, compartanlo.
---
I am an extremely fortunate person. I have had, and taken advantage of, opportunities that very few people in this world get to have. I have travelled the world, I have seen and experienced more things than 99% of this world's people even know exists. I feel it is my moral obligation to share and to inspire, as many successful people have shared with and inspired me. So you have a Mexican guy intent on changing the world, even if it is a little change. Like the saying goes, to the world you are just a person, but to one person you might be the world. May you achieve success, and when you do, share it.
lender.occupational_info:
Desarrollo sistemas financieros de computo para organizaciones grandes, por ejemplo, bancos. Tengo mi propia compaia de consultoria para hacer esto, y tambien ayudo a mis clientes a comenzar y crecer sus compaias.
---
I create financial computer systems for large corporations, such as banks. I have my own consulting company to do this, and I help other people start and grow their own companies.

lender.name: Paolo
lender.loan_because: ok
lender.occupational_info: ok

lender.name: For Johan Droogmans
lender.loan_because: In Memory of Johan Droogmans

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I'd like the world to be different than it is.
lender.occupational_info: I make magazines.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I came to the US as a first generation immigrant and have been extremely blessed as an entreprenauer and businessman. I know how hard it is to get started, and hopefully my little help will give someone a legup in life.
lender.occupational_info: My work is in the financial and realestate industry. My primary business is an insurance brokerage house. I also do a fair amount of real estate developement and rental realestate.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Why should Bono get all the credit?

lender.name: Melody
lender.occupation: Community Engagement at College of William & Mary
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference! And I think we're all connected in this world in ways beyond our imaginations, so it's one way I can live out that connection.
lender.occupational_info: I work with college students to make positive social change while learning about the world and themselves

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I think it's a small way I can help with the near the impossible problem of the global income gap. It's a way for me to take some of the opportunities I've been given and try to help give them to someone else as well.
lender.occupational_info: I work on health policy research; trying to find more efficient ways to provide health care services.

lender.name: Stone
lender.loan_because: I care about other people and I want them to be able to improve their lives. People should help other people. I think everyone should follow the Golden Rule.
lender.occupational_info: I am trying to make a positive difference in the world. I don't want to be part of the problem.....I want to help solve the problems.

lender.name: James Davis
lender.loan_because: kiva.org is a great example that I use in my class on "Technology Targeted at Social Issues"
lender.occupational_info: Teach classes and do research on new technology meant to address social issues.

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: Such a small contribution can make such a big difference.

lender.name: tim
lender.loan_because: Because some day we all need a little help.
lender.occupational_info: own a billing firm for attorneys. I spend a lot of time explaining my product and how it works because it is the first and only product to do what it does!

lender.name: Aidan
lender.loan_because: Using Kiva the loan recipient gets the cash directly without going through an expensive and bureaucratic layer of aid groups. Also the budding entrepreneurs are able to avoid the extortionate rates of interest routinely charged by commercial money lenders in poor countries.
lender.occupational_info: I run an information technology company that was helped by generous private investors in the early stages of its development

lender.name: Phung
lender.loan_because: I'm able to.
lender.occupational_info: I work to ensure effective program design, so that it properly helps people and that it works.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I value empowerment, and the least I can do is make a small contribution to this ideal.

lender.name: Henning
lender.loan_because: ...micro credit works!

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I believe
lender.occupational_info: I create training programs to help workers be able to perform better.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe that this might be the best way to help out the people who need and deserve assistance the most.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that helps other businesses advertise their products and services on Google, Yahoo and other major search engines. We try to get them increased visibility and a better return on their investment.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: I'm letting my 12-year-old sister choose which business owners we lend to so she can begin to think about others.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: the premal abides.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: Sharing is important and helps others believe in the power of community. We are all connected to each other and the earth.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.occupational_info: Retail sales

lender.name: Jack & Maria
lender.loan_because: We read about Mr. Yunus making loans a few years ago and thought it was fantastic. We just realized how easy it is for us to make a difference in someones's life.
lender.occupational_info: Jack works to help people who file bankruptcy to reorganize their debts and complete repayment plans. Maria works for Kaiser Permanente, a HMO with a heart.

lender.name: Arlo
lender.loan_because: I wanted to use my birthday money to help others.

lender.name: Mary
lender.occupation: Mom, Actress, Box Office Mgr, Standardized Patient
lender.loan_because: It's a hand up, not a handout.
lender.occupational_info: Part of my acting deals with being a teaching tool for medical students. I portray various medical cases and the students practice with me.

lender.name: parkuniversitymicroclass
lender.loan_because: All of us are currently enrolled in a class studying Principles of Microeconomics instructed by Mr. Claude R. Robertson. Mr. Robertson brought in a newspaper article from the Arkansas Democrat Gazette featuring microfinancing. He challenged us to get involved in becoming financers. As a group we were able to raise enough money to make three loans. We would like our project to be a success and hopefully we will all be able to make loans individually and continue to help others.
lender.occupational_info: We are all students of Park University attending classes at the Little Rock Air Force Base Campus in Jacksonville, Arkansas.

lender.name: Orrin
lender.loan_because: Christ has helped me and given me the desire to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze data.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: i am able to.
lender.occupational_info: i am a fiber artist and mostly sew and sell my purses online. i also knit and crochet, make soap, and paint. i love all things fiber and love to trade with other artists.

lender.name: The Ulloa Family
lender.occupation: Herman is a TV News Photographer/Editor
lender.loan_because: My family and I would like everyone to have a chance at living decent, honest lives.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It's easy and very worthwhile
lender.occupational_info: Try to help people with mental problems

lender.name: Krista
lender.loan_because: Because I can...and I think it is important to loan to ambitious entrepeneurs that are giving back to their communities as well as their own families.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an architecture firm where I design and plan office Interiors.

lender.name: Rich and Mary
lender.occupational_info: Small Business Owner.

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: I truly believe in the power of microfinance to transform lives. And, from my experiences growing up in the developing world, I know how much opportunity there is for change.
lender.occupational_info: I market chocolate, which means I figure out what kinds of chocolate people want, how to best package it, what price to sell it at, and how to tell people about it.

lender.name: Anuj
lender.loan_because: Its a good way to give back to someone else.Plus I feel really good to help someone

lender.name: Lai San
lender.loan_because: It allows me be a part of the world.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I love giving chances to those who need it & want it.
lender.occupational_info: Interactive marketing

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I believe in those I lend to. They inspire me and I honored to help them in any way I can :)

lender.name: 99c.de
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I want others to be able to do what our team does....make people happy!
lender.occupational_info: We digitally design the thoughts, ideas, and dream products of others. We give their products wings to fly!

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I work in international development. I enjoy the hospitality of great people around the world. Supporting these entrepreneurs is one way I can give back to people who have been so helpful to me.
lender.occupational_info: I manage development projects. Presently in Iraq, soon I will work in S. Sudan.

lender.name: Sabine
lender.loan_because: giving just a little makes all the difference for someone on the other side of the world. It means one less dinner for me but a new life for someone else.

lender.name: Seandski
lender.loan_because: Share the wealth. Help the world. Make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in advertising.

lender.name: Tobias
lender.loan_because: the best way to support is helping people being able to support themselves

lender.name: Andre
lender.occupational_info: I am studying the Law to help people.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: it is usefull

lender.name: Salinas IT-Service GmbH
lender.loan_because: We like to :-)
lender.occupational_info: We work as network consultants and instructors.

lender.name: Walter
lender.loan_because: I believe that even for active and entrepreneurial persons a start capital is necessary to realize their ideas. This process should not be too difficult
lender.occupational_info: Finding out what people need

lender.name: Markus
lender.loan_because: I would help
lender.occupational_info: I sell medical equipment all over europe.

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: I love the opportunity that Kiva gives me to make loans to people that I would otherwise not even know about. It's fun to watch the payments come in and then reloan when they are paid in full. I had a jar of change at home and thought this was a great way to use that money!
lender.occupational_info: Just enjoying life. Learning and trying new things!

lender.name: Vincent
lender.loan_because: I think that is a good system...
lender.occupational_info: I support and help Canon photographers...

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I like to contribute helping others to improve their life and make a difference around them.

lender.name: Stephan
lender.loan_because: To help people lift themselfes out of poverty.

lender.name: Wolf
lender.loan_because: I love to help people realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: My work as an immigration attorney is helping people realize their dreams, be it in their home country or when they immigrate to the United States.

lender.name: Per Vidar
lender.loan_because: I love this idea

lender.name: Joerg
lender.loan_because: it's needed.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I want the help others to stand on their own feets.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: The dollars I earn in the USA will make a bigger difference to people in other parts of the world than they will to me.
lender.occupational_info: I work with archaeologists who research how people lived from 12,000 to 50 years ago. My maps and graphics illustrate what people left behind.

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: I like to help dynamic people with good business ideas. The money we loan is not a big thing for us but for the people who get the money.
lender.occupational_info: I am an eventmanager an organize sport- and galaevents for companies in germany.

lender.name: Kolbjorn
lender.loan_because: I believe more in active investment, trade and business than in traditional, passive aid.

lender.name: Fiorenzo
lender.loan_because: I believe in people

lender.name: Dirk
lender.loan_because: With a small amount, you can make a big choice for somebody

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: It feels GREAT to be able to help people whom in spite of their situation, have the spirit to start or develope a small business towards economic independence.

lender.name: Teddy & Sissi
lender.loan_because: just for fun!

lender.name: Geri
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to receive a bit of much-needed help when beginning a business. I like the feeling of joy that comes in knowing that the person I've loaned to has succeeded, too.
lender.occupational_info: I am a psychologist, which means that I help people to solve their problems and improve their moods through therapy/counseling.

lender.name: Allyson
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in people's lives and Kiva seems to be the most direct method of finding those people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at university full time, and I am a 45 year old single mother of a 4 year old girl. We come from Australia originally but I have lived in Vietnam for 8 years, and my daughter was born here.

lender.name: Kirk
lender.loan_because: I would just like to help a bit...

lender.name: Jorge
lender.loan_because: It`s a great opportunity to help people without resorces develop their own business, their own future.

lender.name: Jan Dagfinn
lender.loan_because: I think it matters.

lender.name: Knud
lender.loan_because: I know from my experience with development institutions like the World Bank that they mostly don't address the real needs of the common people in the Global South.
lender.occupational_info: I'm managing urgewald's program on the World Bank and other Multilateral Development Banks. My regional focus is Africa.

lender.name: Philipp
lender.loan_because: even if I know that it is not very intelligent to give loans at 0% interest rate, I do not follow the argument that this "destroys common lending structures and banks". This would be so, if there was a saturated market. But in fact there is so much need in financing, that often is not available (lack of securities, transaction cost) to the poor. And the Microfinance banks I know here in the country, they are really exclusive, borrowing money to a few "chosen ones". I think this is a good way, not to invest, but to give some charity, that matters and can bring forward self empowerment.
lender.occupational_info: Actually I am working in Tanzania in German development cooperation in the area of Public Private Partnerships, implementing medium and small scale projects in various sectors.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: We are lucky to be able to earn enough money to live. As a former Startup I know the problems to get money for business here, so I can imagine how difficult it is for the Enterpreneurs in the KIVA supported regions.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: fantastic idea, people are proactive entrepreneurs
lender.occupational_info: during my studies I was running my own advertising company for 8 years. I like the entrepreneurial idea behind!

lender.name: Roe
lender.loan_because: In loving memory of Byrd Miller, a quirky, fun-loving, free spirit who could find humor in anything. He loved a challenge. He inspired us all to laugh often & to be true to ourselves.

lender.name: Hansjoerg
lender.occupational_info: I'm manager of the IT-Department of the municipal libraries of munich

lender.name: Beno
lender.loan_because: I want to help reduce poverty in the world!

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I believe all people have the right to access capital in order to improve their businesses and their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work with Deloitte Consulting's Federal Practice and provide strategic planning, program improvement, and grants management services to clients at the CDC. I have my MPH and love how my work contributes to protecting the public's health and ensuring federal funds are used efficiently and effectively.

lender.name: Alain
lender.loan_because: Empowerment is the only way to really help people.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: it empowers others and I'm inspired by the entrepeneurs. I love the idea that people who have never met, from across the world can help one another.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: If we don't help each other out. no one will.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional actor who lives and works in Saint Louis, MO, in the United States. In addition to my theatre work, I also work for the MBA programs at Washington University.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I believe hard working people everywhere deserve a chance to support themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I was a teacher, school media specialist, and librarian until I retired in 2006.

lender.name: Joann
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Retired after a 50 year career in media: TV & Radio.

lender.name: Mormon Youth Group
lender.loan_because: It's a way of making a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Research Analyst--gather, process, and report information.

lender.name: Leanne
lender.loan_because: My son recommended Kiva as a place to help other small entrepreneurs with their businesses. I am blessed to be able to have a business of my own and I am eager to help out.
lender.occupational_info: I own and run a used bookstore. In 2007 my business burnt to the ground, and with the help of many people in my community and beyond I was able to reopen a few months later. I am happy to pass on some of the blessings I have received.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: i am a self-starter who loves building things and want to help others do the same, hope we can learn from each other as we face the common challenges all entrepreneurs face, no matter how small the business
lender.occupational_info: i manage a company that has created a consumer-financed voluntary fast pass for airport security

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: i care

lender.name: Gale
lender.loan_because: What an incredible way to have an impact all around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for a school to provide programs and education for the students.

lender.name: OxfordMississippi.com
lender.occupational_info: The sights, sounds, and stories of Oxford, MS

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: It's a good idea.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a restaurant in New York City where I choose the wine for the wine list and recommend different wines to our guests to drink with their dinner.

lender.name: Cesar
lender.loan_because: If i dont do something good with the money now, I'll spend it on shoes and music cds.
lender.occupational_info: Im a Web Designer :) I make pages like this one happen.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I want others to be able to prosper and live happy and healthy lives.

lender.name: Penny and Bernie
lender.loan_because: We think we have been very fortunate. We have received a helping hand in the past and want to offer a helping hand to others.

lender.name: Chris, Kino, and Jennie
lender.loan_because: Happiness: ours and others.
lender.occupational_info: one of us studies the politics of happiness; one helps students find jobs; and one is a high school student.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I see this as an opportunity to learn more about people in other countries, and to help someone who is already a self starter.
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired, after 30 years working in natural resource management.

lender.name: Balakrishnan
lender.loan_because: I think thats my duty to the society
lender.occupational_info: software engineer

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: I want to help people get off the ground
lender.occupational_info: Development of new technologies and products in the internet space

lender.name: John F.
lender.loan_because: Assisting someone in making their lives a little bit better will hopefully make the world just that little bit more agreeable,

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I would like to see my money used by someone who can improve their lives and then pass the opportunity along to others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I write software for computers.

lender.name: Ajitha
lender.loan_because: I like this idea and it makes me happy that I can make a difference to someone in need.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: This service enables the support of capitalism sans personal sacrifice.
lender.occupational_info:
Judicious manager of violence

lender.name: Annie
lender.occupation: Director of Developent for Houston READ Commission

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: Some time ago, I met up with an ex-coworker who now works for World Vision. He talked about his vision and some ways to help developing countries, one of which being microcredit. I found the idea very intriguing, so I decided to join Kiva and contribute to the pool.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: This is the best way that I can think of to directly support businesses that have social and economic impact in areas of need
lender.occupational_info: Use technology and computer programs to help businesses both small and large

lender.name: Omer
lender.loan_because: I believe these are hard working and creative people trying to improve their family's life.

lender.name: T. S.
lender.loan_because: I admire entrepreneurmanship and found this great oppertunity to take part. I can lend money and in return borrow a share of a dream.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.occupational_info: I manage the finances for a nonprofit theater company.

lender.name: Calamity
lender.loan_because: my boyfriend thinks it's hot.
lender.occupational_info: i help teens map their lives in relation to the world, in hopes that they will take more responsibility as a global citizen

lender.name: Nicholas and Jess
lender.loan_because: Credit is a critical barrier to self-mobilization. Many of the development success stories we have come across have focused in part on improving access to credit.
lender.occupational_info: We work on climate change adaptation and ecological restoration.

lender.name: Gabriella
lender.loan_because: can be the way to give poor people the chance to have projects and realize them

lender.name: Tanja
lender.loan_because: people in rich nations have the responibility to do soemthing for people in developping countries.
lender.occupational_info: My business is finding out where, why and how to bring the ads that the creatives developped in newspaper, TV, radio, any press etc. I do this for a bank in Germany. After a media flight the researcher can find out how effective the investment was. Very interesting!

lender.name: Jeanne and Tom
lender.occupational_info: I study ways to make crops produce more fruit, survive with less water, and grow in poor soil.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: I didn't make it up, but I agree with it completely: Do to others as you would want them to do to you.
lender.occupational_info: I sell collectibles, mostly books and movies, but sometimes clothes and memorabilia.

lender.name: Hasib
lender.occupation: Application System Developer and Business Owner
